ing: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
des: "This is an ever-popular salad at our family functions!"
ins: In a large bowl, dissolve the gelatin and sugar in the boiling water.  Add the cream cheese and whisk until the melted into small chunks.  Add pineapple with juice, soda and nuts and stir until evenly combined.  Chill until set.
